docs.text: Hardware ¶ Z-Wave ¶ At the beginning of my smart home journey i used a lot Z-Wave products. Mostly because zigbee where quite unreliable and there where no generic zigbee coordinator. Now i still use some Z-Wave components, but i try to slowly fade out. Device Count Purpose Link Information Aeotec AEOEZW090-C 1 coordinator https://amzn.to/3thagZg N/A Fibaro Roller Shutter 1 roller shutter actor https://amzn.to/3xfvuZP N/A Fibaro Wall Plug 2 Plug for power measuring https://amzn.to/3Mjf3jE N/A Fibaro Smart Implant 1 Garage Door https://amzn.to/3No2lRZ N/A Eurotronics Spirit Z-Wave Plus 2 TRV https://amzn.to/3NfknWp N/A Zigbee ¶ As i mention, i try to just use zigbee devices. Its easier for me to just maintain just one network. Maybe zigbee devices will be replaces with Matter devices in the near future. docs.text: Software ¶ Home Assistant ¶ Home Assistant is running in my Kubernetes Cluster as a Container. I use the official Home Assistant container for that. Most of my config i edit in the side-car container code-server directly in the browser. Thats makes it easier for me to deploy new configs.
